Privacy Policy

Last modified: June 3, 2019 (view archived versions (0))

Introduction

When you use our services, you’re trusting us with your information. We understand that this is a big responsibility and we work hard to protect your information and put you in control.

Why Leetify collects Personally-Identifying Information

Leetify collects certain Personally-Identifying Information(PII), necessary to carry out our business. Below we will tell you what PII we collect, why we need it and how we use it, as well as what other organisations might have access to your data.

What kind of Personally-Identifying Information do we collect?

We ask users signing up for an Email address, that we use to communicate important information regarding your account, and if you opt-in to it, marketing communication. For example, we might communicate a planned downtime of our service or information regarding a purchase you made.

We also collect some non-personally identifying information such as browser type, language preferences and referring site. This is simply to understand our visitors interaction with our site better and improve the quality of our service. We may at times present aggregated reports of non-personally identifying information.

Who has access to your Personally-Identifying Information?

We take the protection of your PII very seriously, and only ever share your information if we have very good reason to do so. Below is a list of partners and times when your PII is shared.

We share your e-mail address with Amazon Web Services (AWS) in order to send out e-mails to you. AWS only saves your e-mail address for as long as is necessary to send out the e-mail for us.

We also share your email address with Mixpanel, who sends the majority of our email communcation with users around product updates, feedback surveys and similar things.

Google Analytics does have access to your IP address, but anonymize it and delete your actual IP address as soon as it reaches their system, per our request.

Cookies

A cookie is a string of information that a website stores on a visitor's computer, and that the visitor's browser provides to the website each time the visitor returns. Leetify uses cookies to help Leetify identify and track visitors, their usage of Leetify's website, and their website access preferences, which in turn help us improve the quality of our service.

If you'd rather not have cookies placed on your computer, we recommend you to set your browser to refuse cookies from Leetify's websites, with the drawback that certain features of Leetify's websites may not function properly without the aid of cookies.

Privacy Policy Changes

Although changes are likely to be minor, our Privacy Policy may change from time to time. We will not reduce your rights under this Privacy Policy without your explicit consent. We will post any Privacy Policy changes on this page and, if the changes are significant, we will provide a more prominent notice (for example email notification of Privacy Policy changes).

We will also keep prior versions of this Privacy Policy in an archive for your review. We want to be as transparent as possible about the changes we make to our Privacy Policy. In this archive, you can see the previous versions of the policy:

Current version

Contact us:

©2022 Leetify. All rights reserved.

Leetify Terms &. conditions

Effective date: 3 June 2019

Welcome to Leetify

THESE TERMS AND CONDITIONS ARE THE CONTRACT BETWEEN YOU AND Leetify AB. PLEASE READ THEM CAREFULLY BEFORE SIGNING UP FOR OR USING THE SERVICES PROVIDED BY Leetify AB. By using the service provided on the leetify.com website’s (“Service”), a service of Leetify AB ("Leetify"), you are agreeing to be bound by the following terms and conditions (“Terms of Service”).

TL;DR

We are not a large evil corporation. We are gamers, just like you. We won't bug you or bother you unless it is really necessary.

Nowhere in this Terms of Service do you sell your soul to us.

The Terms of Service, while long, is necessary to protect our Company and customers(you) and make it clear what can be expected.

1. Use of your Leetify account

You must use a valid email address for your Leetify account. You must not use the Service for any illegal or abusive purposes. Only one free account per person or legal entity is allowed. You are solely responsible for the security of your account and keeping your password safe.

2. Payment and billing

You must provide Leetify with accurate billing information and keep this information up to date. This applies to all paid services. By subscribing to the Service you give Leetify the right to charge your credit card, or bill you via other payment methods, for fees connected with the Service such as renewal fees or fees for extra services.

The Leetify Service is a subscription service. You pay in advance for each billing cycle on the first day of that cycle. Your Leetify services will be renewed automatically until you cancel the Service. You are responsible for all charges incurred related to your Leetify service, including any applicable taxes or extra service fees.

3. Refund policy

If you wish to ask for a refund or have an invoice cancelled, you need to send an email to info@leetify.com within 2 days (two days) of the invoice date. The email needs to contain your Leetify user id (the email you use to log in to Leetify's Service) and the date of the payment in question.

4. Cancellation and termination of service

You may at any time cancel your Leetify service inside the Leetify control panel provided that any past invoices have been paid. Leetify does not accept cancellations via email or phone. Any abuse of the Service will lead to termination of your account. Leetify reserves the right to decide what is considered abuse of the Service.

5. Use of customer's name and company name

Leetify reserves the right to use your name and/or company name as a reference for marketing or promotional purposes on the leetify.com website and other communication with existing or potential Leetify customers. To decline Leetify this right you need to email info@leetify.com stating that you do not wish to be used as a reference.

6. Changes to terms of service

These Terms of Service may be updated from time to time, and if updates are made you will be prompted to agree to the changes upon logging in to the control panel. The current Terms of Service are always available at https://leetify.com/terms-of-service If the changes are not agreed to, your account is cancelled immediately.

7. Disclaimer

The Leetify Service is provided “as is” and “as available”. Leetify reserves the right to modify the Service from time to time at any time, including adding and removing features and package types. Leetify reserves the right to discontinue the Service at any time after a 30-day notice via email. Leetify reserves the right to change the prices for the Service and any connected extra services at any time.

8. Limitation of liability

You expressly understand and agree that Leetify shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential or exemplary damages, including but not limited to, damages for loss of profits, goodwill, use, data or other intangible losses (even if Leetify has been advised of the possibility of such damages), resulting from:

1. the use or the inability to use the Leetify service;

2. the cost of procurement of substitute goods and services resulting from any goods, data, information or services purchased or obtained or messages received or transactions entered into through or from the Leetify service;

3. unauthorized access to or alteration of your transmissions or data;

4. statements or conduct of any third party on the Leetify service. or

5. any other matter relating to the Leetify service. In no event shall Leetify's total liability to you for all damages, losses, and causes of action (whether in contract, tort (including, but not limited to, negligence), or otherwise) exceed the amount paid by you, if any, for accessing this site.

9. Indemnification

You agree to indemnify, defend and hold harmless Leetify and its officers, directors, employees, consultants and agents from any and all third party claims, liability, damages and/or costs (including, but not limited to, attorney fees) arising from your use of the Leetify service, your violation of the terms of use or your infringement, or infringement by any other user of your account, of any intellectual property or other right of any person or entity. You agree to immediately notify Leetify of any unauthorized use of your account or any other breach of security known to you.

10. Other

If any part of this Terms of Service would be determined by any competent authority to be invalid, unlawful or unenforceable, the remainder of the Terms of Service shall continue to be valid and enforceable to the fullest extent permitted by law.

11. Dispute

This contract shall be governed by the substantive law of Sweden. Any dispute, controversy or claim arising out of or in connection with this contract, or the breach, termination or invalidity thereof, shall be solved by the District Court of Stockholm in Sweden.

Contact us:

©2022 Leetify. All rights reserved.
